Containers.Name: DansGuardian
Containers.Description:
DansGuardian is a web content filter. It blocks naughty bits on the Web.[br][br]
Once the container is started, update your computer's proxy settings to use your unRAID server, port 8080 (or whatever you configured the port to be).[br][br]
This container works well with Privoxy. Just set PROXYIP to your server IP, and PROXYPORT to your Privoxy port (8118 by default).[br][br]
[b]Note that if your unRAID server is down, your internet won't work because the proxy won't be running.[/b][br][br]
Containers.Overview: DansGuardian is content-control software: software designed to control which websites users can access. It also includes virus filtering and usage monitoring features.
